CustomField.description: Enabling Reminder and Expiration Settings allows you to specify reminder and expiration defaults in DocuSign for Salesforce. These settings override the default Reminders & Expirations settings from your DocuSign account.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enabling Reminder and Expiration Settings allows you to specify reminder and expiration defaults in DocuSign for Salesforce. These settings override the default Reminders & Expirations settings from your DocuSign account.
CustomField.label: Use Account Notification Defaults
